entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sandy Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
